original_title: Death of 16-year-old girl in Kalutara: Investigations handed over to CID
original_body_lines: The investigations into the death of the 16-year-old girl from Kalutara, whose naked body was found along the Colombo-Galle railway tracks, were handed over to the Criminal Investigation Department (CID).
The investigations were handed over to the CID on the instructions of the Inspector General of Police (IGP).
The Kalutara South Police had launched investigations after the naked body of the girl was found near the railway line behind a hotel on the main street of Galle Road in Kalutara.
Accordingly, the 29-year-old main suspect, who had brought the 16-year-old school girl to a hotel in Kalutara, was arrested and detained for further questioning.
